Title: Increases the penalty for robbery of property from a bank; makes the crime a class C felony
Summary: Increases the penalty for robbery of property from a bank; makes the crime a class C felony.
LawCode: Amd §§592 & 592-a, Bank L; amd §160.10, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the banking law and the penal law, in relation to increasing the penalty for robbery of property from a bank
